pageTitle: Prime Minister’s itinerary for Friday, June 11, 2021 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Note: All times local

Cornwall, United Kingdom

Private meetings.

11:30 a.m. The Prime Minister will meet with the Prime Minister of Australia, Scott Morrison.        

Canadian Bilateral Meeting Room
Carbis Bay Estate Hotel

Note for media:

  • Pooled photo opportunity

12:30 p.m. The Prime Minister will meet with the Prime Minister of the United Kingdom, Boris Johnson.

United Kingdom Bilateral Meeting Room
Carbis Bay Estate Hotel

Note for media:

  • Pooled photo opportunity

2:00 p.m. The Prime Minister will participate in the G7 Official Welcoming Ceremony.

Carbis Bay Estate Hotel

Note for media:

  • Pooled photo opportunity and host broadcast coverage

2:25 p.m. The Prime Minister will participate in the G7 family photo.

Carbis Bay Estate Hotel

Note for media:

  • Pooled photo opportunity and host broadcast coverage

2:45 p.m. The Prime Minister will participate in the G7 Working Session I entitled “Building Back Better: Recovery for all.”

Plenary Room, Second Floor
Carbis Bay Estate Hotel

Note for media:

  • Pooled photo opportunity and host broadcast coverage

5:30 p.m. The Prime Minister will participate in a reception given by the Prime Minister of the United Kingdom, Boris Johnson.

Eden Project

Note for media:

  • Host broadcaster and host photographer only

7:10 p.m. The Prime Minister will participate in the G7 family photo.

Eden Project

Note for media:

  • Host broadcaster and host photographer only

7:45 p.m. The Prime Minister will attend the G7 Leaders’ Dinner hosted by the Prime Minister of the United Kingdom, Boris Johnson.

Eden Project

Note for media:

  • Host photographer only
